channel.title: How can I change the background on clients
channel.description:
Hey, before i make my statement i would like to say i have looked through all of the tutorials and i have not found anything there.
i know this seems like a stupid question, but i know there is a certain way to do it. how can i change the background picture on clients. ill be back, just post. thanks

item.title: How can I change the background on clients
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.source: How can I change the background on clients

item.title: How can I change the background on clients
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

[quote=“EatU4Dinner, post:2, topic:256911”]ok open paint.exe and make a new pic thats this size: 766 x 503

make a piture or paste a pic w/e

then save it as png.[/quote]You can use the same name as the other one or search in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1. and change the name to your desire.

Read full topic
